com.appscend.hub

Interface KRAdapter

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    APSFrameworkExtension, IVeeplayRenderer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    APSMediaPlayerButtonOverlayController, APSMediaPlayerClosableOverlayController, APSMediaPlayerControlsOverlayController, APSMediaPlayerHTMLOverlayController, APSMediaPlayerImageOverlayController, APSMediaPlayerJSYoutubeOverlayController, APSMediaPlayerMidrollOverlayController, APSMediaPlayerMRAIDOverlayController, APSMediaPlayerOverlayController, APSMediaPlayerSkipOverlayController, APSMediaPlayerTextOverlayController, APSMediaPlayerVimeoOverlayController, APSMediaPlayerYoutubeOverlayController, APSMRAIDExtension, ExoPlayerRenderer, MediaPlayerRenderer

    public interface KRAdapter
    The KRAdapter interface allows an object to declare itself as being of a certain type.

    Appscend
